data.title: MV Group Production - Voruta Natural Chokeberry (Aronijų) Wine
data.meta_description: Naturalness, simplicity, authenticity and sustainability. These are the main ingredients in formula of Voruta wine. Simplicity of choices, sustainability of taste, authentic fruit winemaking traditions since 1926.
data.text:
Description

Voruta: Natural fruit and berry wines - a unique part of the Lithuanian national heritage, which has preserved its unique winemaking traditions and recipes for many decades.

About: Chokeberry wine stands out from other wines of the VORUTA brand with a longer maturation time. This natural chokeberry wine is distinctive for its abundance of tannins and prolonged aging.

Aroma and taste: Prolonged aging imbues this natural chokeberry wine with a bold aroma, rich color and somewhat tart palate that is characteristic of these berries. It is special due to the abundance of tannins, and during longer maturation in oak acquires an expressive aroma, is rich in color, rich in the characteristic taste of chokeberry berries.

Production Process: Longer matured than other Voruta wines. Aged together with oak.

Consumption: Taste of wine pairs well with meat dishes – grilled meat, beef, game, and wild poultry – as well as spicy starters and mature cheese.

Serving Suggestion: Recommended serving temperature: 16-18°C.

Please feel free to contact us for more details or simply send us a message to know more.
